name: Public meetings and public hearings
text:
(a)  State agencies to which this part applies shall not be required to translate meeting notices, agendas, or minutes.
     (b)  Subject to section 371-33, oral language services for public meetings or public hearings held by the legislature shall be provided if requested at least forty-eight hours in advance of the meeting or hearing.  Where the notice of any public meeting or public hearing is posted less than fortyeight hours in advance of the meeting or hearing, oral language services shall be provided if requested at least twenty-four hours in advance of the meeting or hearing. [L 2006, c 290, pt of §1]
